knimeNode.name: Write Image
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a image object to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes a image object to a file. The image input object must contain a valid image as otherwise the node will fail during executing. The Image extension is chosen based on the given image type.
fullDescription.option: Specify the output file. The target folder must already exist.
Select this to allow the node to overwrite any existing file. If unselected and the file exists, the node will fail during execution.
